divs: Sighting DetailsTo whoever wants to read, I was putting the garbage out and as I walked down the driveway I was thinking how I see repeated patterns in the sky in relation to the locations of stars...(I had been outback a few minutes prior watching the sky and I saw the fastest shooting star I've ever seen).. anyway I'm walking down the driveway and I fixate on two stars in the northeast sky, as I'm looking at them they rotate and switch locations... this feeling overtook me like is this real? did i really see that? I stopped walking as soon as they started to rotate and I stared at them for a moment then the one of them started heading north further away from me. I dropped my garbage bag I headed down the street after it. Until it faded away in the distance. I'm pretty sure the other light that stayed behind was gone because this happened near a pretty bright star and their weren't any bright enough objects to match what I saw near by when I looked for it. These lights I saw were standing still when i fixated on them. Then after a moment or two they swung around each other like as if they were magnetically retracted or attracted to or from each other. I'm positive this is what I saw. I live near McGuire air force base so maybe they were doing some high altitude test flights or something but it sure got me excited. Hey I'm not a kook I know what I saw I'm just not sure what I was looking at. Maybe somebody else saw it too. Thanks for reading, Joe
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Mansfield
There were no other sightings in Mansfield on or around May 19th 2010
Summary: I saw 2 stars dance and one flew away.
